text:
Raskolnikov entered the office. 

“Is anyone here?” he asked.

A clerk looked up. 

“Whom do you want?”

Suddenly, a familiar voice called, “At your service!”

Raskolnikov shuddered. The Explosive Lieutenant stood before him. 

“Why is he here?” Raskolnikov thought.

“Come to see us? What about?” Ilya Petrovitch asked, grinning.

“It’s rather early for business,” he added.

Raskolnikov hesitated.

“I must admit, I…” Ilya trailed off.

“Raskolnikov,” he finally said.

“Of course, I remember you,” Ilya replied. 

“Rodion Romanovitch,” Raskolnikov corrected quietly.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov encounters the Explosive Lieutenant at the bureau, feeling the weight of fate as he questions the unexpected meeting.
